# init(type:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new touch type mask from the touch type.

## Declaration

```swift
init(type: NSTouch.TouchType)
```

## Creating a Touch Type Mask

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a new touch type mask from the given raw value.
